title: Easy Thai Fish Cakes
ingredients: ['500g boneless white fish (use 2 varieties for maximum flavour)', '1 egg', '1 stick lemongrass, finely sliced', '125ml coconut cream or milk', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '2 tablespoons palm sugar', '2 chopped red chillies', '2 cloves garlic', '150g finely chopped green beans', '1/2 red pepper, finely chopped', '1 bunch coriander, chopped']
